General.Name: AfriTin Mining Ltd
General.Description: Andrada Mining Limited, together with its subsidiaries, is involved in the exploration and development of projects in Namibia and South Africa. Its flagship asset is the Uis brownfield tin mine located in the Erongo region, Namibia. The company was formerly known as AfriTin Mining Limited and changed its name to Andrada Mining Limited in January 2023. Andrada Mining Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Saint Peter Port, Guernsey.
General.Address: Oak House, Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, GY1 3RH
